pageContext.claim: “No, I would say he's [Michael Cohen] been threatened by the truth. He's only been threatened by the truth. And he doesn't want to do that probably for me, or other of his clients. He has other clients also, I assume. And he doesn't want to tell the truth for me, or other of his clients.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's former lawyer, Michael Cohen, sought to delay congressional testimony saying his family had been threatened by Trump's tweets calling for an investigation of his father-in-law. Trump here completely dodged a question about whether he had threatened Cohen's family with retribution if he testified publicly. (Cohen agreed to testify in private.)
